transcript: I tried everything. I've called everyone I know I've tried everything. No one can do anything for me or they won't do anything for me.

segments.text: I tried everything. I've called everyone I know I've tried everything. No one can do anything for me or they won't do anything for me.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I've tried everything.  I've called everyone I know.  I've tried everything. No one can do anything for me or they won't do anything for me.
